channel.title: Client Troub pl0x
channel.description: hey could sum1 help me im stumped u know how at the top of a webbrowser or file like examples:New Folder, Mozilla Firefox, Internet Explorer ect. well on my client it says server client how do i change it to say Kings of Death: Edited by Mod Death?

item.title: Client Troub pl0x
item.dc:creator: @Skelebob Skelebob
item.description:
@Skelebob wrote:

There is also some statements in your Client.java.
When i got my client, it said things like…

                                            [317 Client]
                              New Character     Login

In client.java and class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 ( i think ), i can change the 317 Client to *****Scape

(Not advertising)

Read full topic

item.title: Client Troub pl0x
item.dc:creator: @Jr_Scape Jr. Scape
item.description:
@Jr_Scape wrote:

In the folder with your client, find this file;
Frame_Sub1.java
Open that.
You should find something like this:

[code]import java.awt.*;
import sign.signlink;

public final class Frame_Sub1 extends Frame
{

public Frame_Sub1(Applet_Sub1 applet_sub1, int i, byte byte0, int j)
{
    aBoolean35 = true;
    anApplet_Sub1_36 = applet_sub1;
    setTitle("     ");
    setResizable(false);
    show();
    if(byte0 != 5)
        aBoolean35 = !aBoolean35;
    toFront();
    resize(i + 8, j + 28);
}

public Graphics getGraphics()
{
    Graphics g = super.getGraphics();
    g.translate(4, 24);
    return g;
}

public final void update(Graphics g)
{
    anApplet_Sub1_36.update(g);
}

public final void paint(Graphics g)
{
    anApplet_Sub1_36.paint(g);
}
public String aString323_Sub9242()
{
 return client.method993277();
}

private boolean aBoolean35;
Applet_Sub1 anApplet_Sub1_36;

}
[/code]

Now, search this:

setTitle

(15th line down)
and add the title between the qouatation’s after ’ setTitle(" ’
It should look something like this:

setTitle("YOUR CLIENT NAME");

Save, and compile. Then Run it.
Done!

~Mike~

Read full topic
